title: ATbar
creator: University of Southampton
description: It is a toolbar to help users customise the way they view and interact with web pages. It also allows users to test sites for their accessibility with text to speech, CSS changes, coloured overlays and backgrounds, font style and size changes and line spacing. It can be modified adding other tools.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
